args.plan: A comprehensive training plan to prepare Ajinkya for a Himalayan race in August, focusing on building endurance, climbing ability, and overall fitness over the next 30 days.

day_wise.title: Rest Day
day_wise.description: Take a complete rest day to recover from previous rides and allow your body to adapt.

day_wise.title: Base Endurance Ride
day_wise.description: Ride at a steady pace for 90 minutes on flat terrain to build your aerobic base.

day_wise.title: Hill Repeats
day_wise.description: Find a hill and do 5 repeats, focusing on maintaining a steady pace. Rest for 5 minutes between each repeat.

day_wise.title: Recovery Ride
day_wise.description: A gentle ride to aid recovery. Keep the intensity low and enjoy the ride.

day_wise.title: Tempo Ride
day_wise.description: Ride at a tempo pace, slightly below race pace, for 60 minutes. Focus on maintaining a consistent speed and cadence.

day_wise.title: Rest Day
day_wise.description: Take a complete rest day to recover from previous rides and allow your body to adapt.

day_wise.title: Long Endurance Ride
day_wise.description: Go for a long ride to build endurance. Focus on maintaining a steady pace.

day_wise.title: Strength Training
day_wise.description: Off-bike strength training focusing on core and leg strength.

day_wise.title: Hill Climb Simulation
day_wise.description: Simulate a long hill climb by finding a long steady climb and maintaining a steady pace. Focus on pacing and breathing.

day_wise.title: Recovery Ride
day_wise.description: A gentle ride to aid recovery. Keep the intensity low and enjoy the ride.

day_wise.title: Threshold Intervals
day_wise.description: Perform intervals at your threshold pace to improve your lactate threshold. 5x5 minutes with 5 minutes rest between each.

day_wise.title: Rest Day
day_wise.description: Take a complete rest day to recover from previous rides and allow your body to adapt.

day_wise.description: Ride at a steady pace for 90 minutes on flat terrain to build your aerobic base.

day_wise.title: Recovery Ride
day_wise.description: A gentle ride to aid recovery. Keep the intensity low and enjoy the ride.

day_wise.title: Tempo Ride
day_wise.description: Ride at a tempo pace, slightly below race pace, for 70 minutes. Focus on maintaining a consistent speed and cadence.

day_wise.description: Simulate a long hill climb by finding a long steady climb and maintaining a steady pace. Focus on pacing and breathing.

day_wise.title: Recovery Ride
day_wise.description: A gentle ride to aid recovery. Keep the intensity low and enjoy the ride.

day_wise.title: Threshold Intervals
day_wise.description: Perform intervals at your threshold pace to improve your lactate threshold. 5x6 minutes with 5 minutes rest between each.

day_wise.title: Rest Day
day_wise.description: Take a complete rest day to recover from previous rides and allow your body to adapt.

day_wise.title: Base Endurance Ride
day_wise.description: Ride at a steady pace for 100 minutes on flat terrain to build your aerobic base.

day_wise.title: Hill Repeats
day_wise.description: Find a hill and do 7 repeats, focusing on maintaining a steady pace. Rest for 5 minutes between each repeat.

day_wise.title: Recovery Ride
day_wise.description: A gentle ride to aid recovery. Keep the intensity low and enjoy the ride.

day_wise.title: Tempo Ride
day_wise.description: Ride at a tempo pace, slightly below race pace, for 80 minutes. Focus on maintaining a consistent speed and cadence.

day_wise.title: Rest Day
day_wise.description: Take a complete rest day to recover from previous rides and allow your body to adapt.

day_wise.title: Long Endurance Ride
day_wise.description: Go for a long ride to build endurance. Focus on maintaining a steady pace.

day_wise.title: Strength Training
day_wise.description: Off-bike strength training focusing on core and leg strength.

args.goal: Prepare for a Himalayan race in August by building endurance, climbing ability, and overall fitness.
